title: Ep. 401 - Save The Planet: Don’t Recycle
description:
SF Airport has officially banned plastic water bottles. We will examine the real purpose behind the rules. Then, Biden releases his first televised campaign ad, and a new study may have just confirmed 75 years of kooky, cranky, far-right conspiracy theories. Date: 08-20-2019
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
